text: @SenSchumer It's June 7th, Democrats are STILL holding COVID-19 RELIEF hostage as they PERSIST in prioritizing their liberal agenda over Americans struggling to survive. TAXPAYER FUNDED ABORTION? ELIMINATE VOTER ID? TAX BREAKS FOR THE RICH? These are more important than REAL COVID-19 RELIEF?
